name: Intraspecific Arena
description:
Play against your Friend in this Local 2 player game! Convert followers as you play as one of three factions. Balance converting, capturing your friends converts, and murder! Fun for everyone!

Controls:

Player1:

WASD - Move

E - Convert

Q-Attack

Player2:

Arrow Keys - Move

Numpad 0 or M - Convert

Numpad 1 or N - Attack
